name: Bottle Grannies
description:
Bottle Grannies is about managing a group of bottle collecting grandmothers and send them to collection gigs around the city. Take into account the strengths and weaknesses of the grannies when sending for the task and gather experience as well as money. From rest home, you can even hire rare or legendary grandmothers whose special skills are a significant advantage on the field. While you wait for the gigs to end, work out with grandmas or go back to returning bottles.

Atmosphere

Game is a relaxing light weight semi-idle game that you can easily let play on your second monitor while you do something else. Some aspects of the game require more focus than others.

Systems

Choose a gig and take into account your grannies' special abilities. For example: Send the mobility scooter granny to gigs that require high speeds and the bun scented granny to meet the friendly partygoers.

Compete against others

Compete on the monthly leaderboard to show off and collect achievements from dozen of different ones.

Story behind this

In some countries it is a common sight to see the elderly collecting bottles to bring them to grocery stores for recycling deposit. That's pretty much how the idea for this game started.

Customization

Customize your roster of grannies however you see fit. Hire them from the rest home and equip them with hats that boost their experience and income gain among other stats.

Localization

Game is in english and finnish

Progress

The game automatically saves your progress.
